comment:
* Helper class for TextView. Bridge between the TextView and the Dictionary service.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: AVERAGE_WORD_LENGTH
variables.comment: Rough estimate, such that the word iterator interval usually does not need to be shifted

variables.name: WORD_ITERATOR_INTERVAL
variables.comment: When parsing, use a character window of that size. Will be shifted if needed

variables.name: mIsSentenceSpellCheckSupported
variables.comment: Although word SC has a sequential option.

variables.name: mIds
variables.comment: Contains null SpellCheckSpans after index mLength.

variables.name: mLength
variables.comment: The mLength first elements of the above arrays have been initialized

variables.name: mSpellParsers
variables.comment: Parsers on chunk of text, cutting text into words that will be checked

variables.name: mWordIterator
variables.comment: concurrently due to the asynchronous nature of onGetSuggestions.

methods.name: private boolean isSessionActive()
methods.comment:
* @return true if a spell checker session has successfully been created. Returns false if not,
     * for instance when spell checking has been disabled in settings.

methods.name: private void addSpellCheckSpan(Editable editable, int start, int end)
public void spellCheck(int start, int end)
private SpellCheckSpan onGetSuggestionsInternal(SuggestionsInfo suggestionsInfo, int offset, int length)
private void createMisspelledSuggestionSpan(Editable editable, SuggestionsInfo suggestionsInfo, SpellCheckSpan spellCheckSpan, int offset, int length)
public static boolean haveWordBoundariesChanged(final Editable editable, final int start, final int end, final int spanStart, final int spanEnd)

methodNames: private void addSpellCheckSpan(Editable editable, int start, int end)
